meanings.definition: A person who traces or studies the descent of persons or families.
meanings.sent1: Genealogists enjoy discovering their family history through research.
meanings.sent2: Many genealogists spend hours in libraries and archives searching for information.
meanings.sent3: The genealogists at the family reunion were excited to share their findings.
meanings.sent4: She dove into the family tree like a skilled genealogist unraveling a mystery.
meanings.sent5: The genealogists' passion for ancestry shines through in their meticulous work.

meanings.definition: Those who investigate family histories and lineages.
meanings.sent1: My aunt is one of the genealogists in our family, always digging into the past.
meanings.sent2: Genealogists often collaborate with distant relatives to piece together the family tree.
meanings.sent3: The genealogists at the library were so engrossed in their research they didn't notice the time.
meanings.sent4: The genealogists' dedication to uncovering the past is truly admirable.
meanings.sent5: As genealogists, they are like detectives solving a historical puzzle.
